data.title: Song of the Day
data.meta_description: Music lovers from 89.3 The Current comb through mountains of music to choose the best new, independent, and unreleased songs to share with you each weekday.
data.text:
Today’s Song of the Day is “Twist and Turn” from Cardinals’ EP Cardinals, out now.

Today’s Song of the Day is “I Guess Time Just Makes Fools of Us All” from Father John Misty’s album Greatish Hits: I Followed My Dreams and My Dreams Said to Crawl, out now.

Today’s Song of the Day is “People Always Change” from Tiny Habits’ album All For Something, out now.

Today’s Song of the Day is “People Move On” from Jess Cornelius’ album CARE/TAKING, out now.

Today’s Song of the Day is “The Head of a Dog” from Dylan Hicks & Small Screens’ album Modern Flora, out September 6.

Today’s Song of the Day is “Hiding (feat. Lykke Li)” from Ben Böhmer’s album Bloom, out September 27.

Today’s Song of the Day is “People Never Change” from Peter Cat Recording Co.’s album Beta, out August 9.

Today’s Song of the Day is “Mint Tea” from Johnny Blue Skies’ album Passage du Desir, out now.

Today’s Song of the Day is “Sunlight To My Soul featuring Soweto Gospel Choir” by Angelique Kidjo.
